C19.description: The economic operator has entered into agreements with other economic operators aimed at distorting competition.

C20.description: The economic operator is aware of any conflict of interest due to its participation in the procurement procedure.

C22.name: Early termination, damages, or other comparable sanctions
C22.description: A prior contract with a buyer or a prior contract executed by the economic operator was terminated early, or damages or other comparable sanctions were imposed in connection with that prior contract.

C23.name: Misrepresentation, withheld information, unable to provide required documents or obtained confidential information of this procedure
C23.description: The economic operator has been guilty of serious misrepresentation in supplying the information required for the verification of the absence of grounds for exclusion or the fulfilment of the selection criteria, it has withheld such information, it has not been able, without delay, to submit the supporting documents required by a buyer, or it has undertaken to unduly influence the decision making process of the buyer, to obtain confidential information that may confer upon it undue advantages in the procurement procedure or to negligently provide misleading information that may have a material influence on decisions concerning exclusion, selection or award.

C67.name: Lack of reliability to exclude risks to the security of the country
C67.description: The economic operator has been found based on any means of evidence, including protected data sources, not to possess the reliability necessary to exclude risks to the security of the country.

C24.name: Breaching of obligations set under purely national exclusion grounds
C24.description: The economic operator has breached its obligations set under purely national grounds of exclusion.

C48.name: Special requirements check
C48.description: The economic operator will allow checks to be conducted on the production capacities or the technical capacity of the economic operator and, where necessary, on the means of study and research which are available to it as well as on the quality control measures. The checks are required in the case where complex products or services are to be supplied or, exceptionally, for products or services which are required for a special purpose. The checks are to be performed by the buyer or a competent official body designated by the buyer, coming from the country in which the supplier or service provider is established.
